ComicInfo.Summary: Ten years after they landed. All over the world. And they did nothing, standing on the surface of the Earth like trees, exerting their silent pressure on the world, as if there were no-one here and nothing under foot. Ten years since we learned that there is intelligent life in the universe, but that they did not recognize us as intelligent or alive. Beginning a new science fiction graphic novel by WARREN ELLIS and JASON HOWARD.
ComicInfo.Tags: Shu,New York City,Nileen Siva,Rio de Janeiro,People's Republic of China,Norway,Tian Chenglei
